Name: 失落的地下城 Lost Dungeon
About the game: This is an ARPG game with a certain degree of freedom. Some elements of roguelike games are used for reference in the game. In the game you will play an adventurer who has just gone to the dungeon. You can talk to all NPCs in the dungeon, shop and even kill them. You can experience simple planting functions in dungeons. It can forge weapons, refine pharmaceuticals, make food and brew. You can also explore the whole dungeon to find the secrets hidden in it, or go to the lost dungeon as an adventurer. The game has 19 weapons and 30 + skills. There are 31 BOSS waiting for challenge in the game. The game has two weeks of exclusive occupation and skills. Last: Thank you very much for your support. I hope our game will bring you pleasure.
